title: Involvement of prescription opioids in fatal car crashes climbs sevenfold

title_detail.value: Involvement of prescription opioids in fatal car crashes climbs sevenfold

summary: The percentage of fatally injured drivers who tested positive for prescription opioids rose sevenfold from 1 percent in 1995 to over 7 percent in 2015, according to a new American study.

summary_detail.value: The percentage of fatally injured drivers who tested positive for prescription opioids rose sevenfold from 1 percent in 1995 to over 7 percent in 2015, according to a new American study.
